abstract: NBA commissioner David Stern says regular-season games may be canceled through Christmas if players and management cannot reach agreement by Oct 18.
snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern says regular-season games may be canceled through Christmas if the two sides do not reach an agreement by Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern says regular-season games may be canceled through Christmas if the two sides do not reach an agreement by Tuesday.

headline.main: More Games in Danger, Stern Says
headline.print_headline: More Games in Danger, Stern Says
